Python Software Engineer/Modelling Expert állás Budapest
C
Python
Mesterséges intelligencia állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is committed to making sustainable, reliable, and affordable energy a reality by pushing the boundaries of what is possible. They uphold a 150-year legacy of innovation that encourages our search for people who will support their focus on decarbonization, new technologies, and energy transformation.Elvárások / RequirementsExpert Level:
Degree in computer science, engineering, physics or (applied) mathematics (PhD is an advantage)
Python including Pytest, Numpy, Pandas
Git and Gitlab CI/CD.
Non-linear dynamic Optimization with direct approach (Collocation).
Business fluent English language (if you can speak in German it is a plus but it is not expected)
 Advanced Level:
Formulation and solution of dynamic optimization problems.
Solving performance and robustness issues with non-linear optimization problems.
Transient behavior of (power) plants.
Model based control technology.
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Software engineering of innovative MPC solutions for improved start-up and operation of power-plants and implementation of these optimal control solutions in real power-plants worldwide
Setup and verification of transient process models
Ongoing development and maintenance of software for solving of non-linear optimization problems in Python, C++ or in Modelica
Execution of projects for online performance optimization of power-plants
Customizing the SW as per project specific requirements
Integration, testing, documentation, review
Collaboration in international teams
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Competitive salary level (based on your professional background)
Other benefits: cafeteria, yearly bonus
Work in a friendly, modern environment
2 Home office per week
Flexible working hours – work-life balance provided
Training opportunities
Team building events, fruit days, health care programmes in the company

SAP IBP Consultant állás Országos
SAP
SAP állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.Elvárások / Requirements
Degree in (Business) Informatics
More than 3 years of experience in SAP IBP (Sales & Operations Planning, or Demand Planning, Supply & Response, IBP for Inventory)
Knowledge of SAP-Supply Chain processes
Agile Project Management skills 
Strong communication skills, including the virtual team environment
Fluent in English
Advantages:
S/4 HANA experience, ideally in APO PP/DS 
German languages knowledge
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Driving Digitalization in the Supply Chain Program Planning area, by implementing E2E processes in one integrated system: IBP
Be part of the IT global project team, taking over the responsibility for tasks in agile model driven projects
Integration of the IBP solutions in the company IT-landscape, building interfaces to other SAP and non-SAP systems
Tests and rollouts of our Program Planning templates in the different company-divisions
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support

Senior DevOps Engineer állás Budapest
AWS
Rendszer / Hálózat, DevOps állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, the UK, and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, and an Asset Management organization with locations in the UK, US, NL, and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit, and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, they foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. They are a people business, and they recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. They value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.Elvárások / RequirementsWhat You Will Need:Qualifications;Four-year Computer Science or related degree, or equivalent work experience;3 or more years of experience including 2 years of experience in supporting enterprise-level platform installations;3 years of experience working with cloud providers (Azure/ AWS, etc..);At least 2 years of experience with Agile development and planning methodologies;2-3 years of experience working in a high performing DevOps team or role;2-3 years of experience in performance monitoring, alerting and troubleshooting in an enterprise;Strong, holistic understanding of the internet and hosting from the network layer up through the application layerPreferred:Experience working in roles with a strong focus on security, including automated alerting and response;Demonstrate a strong understanding of API’s and API Security;Demonstrated ability in automated code testing;Certifications in relevant technologies, methods, or platforms;Demonstrate the key critical behaviors of commitment to task, communication, customer focus, decision;Making/problem solving, tolerance of ambiguity, planning, prioritizing, and goal settingAmit kínálunk / OfferWhat You Will Do:Develop, Deploy and Support Cloud Infrastructure, as code artifacts or modules;Design, Build and Maintain Cloud infrastructure and applications;Support and deliver using Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery pipelines;Design and Support resiliency and scalability using AWS and other cloud platforms;Enable systems with automated monitoring and alerting;Support the Team and Customers with day-to-day requests, Change and Incident tickets;Support Technology stack refresh on Systems (end-to-end) when required;Ensure automated security is built into each technology stackKapcsolattartó / InformationCompensation:
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
 Brand new office at an excellent location
 Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A highly people-centric, positive, and supportive work environment

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. We are looking for Data and AI Solution Architect colleagues to be part of their team. Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor’s degree (Masters preferred) in Computer Sciences / Information Technology (or equivalent) with fundamental knowledge of Solution Design in data science, (big data) analytics and AI technologies, processes and procedure models
3+ years of experience in a Solution Design or Architectural role preferably in (Big Data) Analytics, cloud/software applications and other related disciplines
Good knowledge of Cloud solution designs associated data, analytics and ML frameworks/libraries and analytics tools and technology (Microsoft Azure Cloud, Databricks, MLflow, DevOps, CI/CD pipelines and automation etc.)
Passion for data, always striving to learn new things and at the same time applying your skills and new technology to bring value to our business partners
Highly motivated and open personality, outstanding ability to communicate, personal commitment, organizational skills, flexibility, creativity, teamwork
Experience working in agile teams, comfortable working with geographically distributed teams.
Excellent verbal and written English language skills
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Design and support implementation and operation of cloud Data Science, Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence solutions in accordance with the strategically set technology stack
Understand and translate business requirements in appropriate system design for full -life-cycle development projects and software products in a cross-functional team of Analytics and Artificial Intelligence solutions
Establish Data and AI architecture and solution design related routines, develop and adhere to standards and guidelines in alignment with our Enterprise Architecture Management
Ensure usage of strategic systems and a sustainable incorporation of Data and AI Solution Design skills and knowledge within our Partner and actively advise internal customers on related questions
Engage in national/international data, tech & architecture communities and support the firm to stay up to date to market developments

Project Manager - Global Identity & Access Managem... állás Országos
IT management állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for a Project Manager - Global Identity & Access Management (GIAM) Operations Support.
The Global Identity & Access Management (GIAM) is a global organization within Chief Information Security Office (CISO) with 700+ employees located across the globe. GIAM manages entitlement and provisioning of access for internal employees / contractors and increasingly for external clients who are using our client's applications. Elvárások / RequirementsBachelor's degree or higher with a concentration in Information Technology, Computer Science, Cyber Security or related field or equivalent relevant work experience. 2 - 4 year’s work experience in Technical Project Management, Information Security, Computer Science or Cyber Security. Must be committed to the delivery of quality customer service.Must be a self-starter with the ability to work in a fast-paced environment.Deep knowledge GIAM Ops and/or GIAM Ops supported systems or applications General knowledge of Identity& Access Management practices on various platforms, applications, and systems.Experience with problem and incident management processes for security and identity and access management incidents.Extensive knowledge of global regulatory guidelines, industry standard security practices, client's corporate information security policies and compliance controlsExcellent problem-solving skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills required to negotiate internally and externally, often at a senior level. Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office products (PowerPoint and Excel required) and GIAM Ops tools.Amit kínálunk / OfferMaintain a strong relationship with key business partners to foster a mutually beneficial partnership.Represent GIAM Ops interests with technology partners when they want to make version updates and enhancements to GIAM Ops supported systems.Provides general IS consulting services including interpretation and/or clarification of IS policy, procedures, standards and or conceptsEnsure strong program and project level governance, including monitoring and control efforts for the projects supported by GPO Ops, in compliance with Project Management Policy and Procedures.Collaborates in the definition and implementation of IS standards to align procedures and practices in compliance with client's standards.Works with the business to validate compliance with IS policies, practices, and procedures within the scope of a project or GIAM Ops processes.Participates in the planning and implementation of IS administration for IT and business driven projects. Driving GIAM Ops project deliverables and managing the relationship between business/technical partner project teams and/or GIAM Ops Service DeliverySupport the GIAM Ops organization in meeting any ad hoc requirements from our partners
Tasks will include:
Evolve and maintain client and business Information Security Administration support relationships for multiple lines of businessResponsible for GIAM Ops owned project milestones and deliverablesCoordinate GIAM Ops engagement for client's level initiativesPartner with IS governance programs and coordinating within GIAM Ops to implement policy changesUnderstand risk and control levels for multi-functional areas for GIAM Ops supported systems/applications/tools and propose revisions where necessary. Readily adopt automation strategies wherever practical and cost efficient. Partner with peers within other service delivery centers and across Global Identity and Access Management to maximize operational efficiencies and effectiveness. Maintain a professional relationship with our business partners, colleagues and external customers through effective communications and diplomacy to guide and influence IS practices.Provide project or program updates to GIAM Ops leadership and our business partners through multiple channels including verbal and written mediaProactively review GIAM Ops processes to address business impacts based on metrics review, business and GIAM Ops partner feedback or other sources to identify root causes and possible process improvements.Proactively engage in any new system development or major enhancements that affect GIAM Ops services so GIAM Ops can provide the appropriate support and advisory.Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our client offers:
Competitive compensation package with extensive benefits:
Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities

IT Product Owner állás Budapest
IT management állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentÜgyfelünk egy rendezvény-technika területén nemzetközi szinten elismert magyar vállalat, akiknek a budapesti központjukba keressük egyik termékük Product Owner-ét.Elvárások / RequirementsEHHEZ MINDENKÉPP SZÜKSÉGES, HOGY LEGYEN:
felsőfokú műszaki vagy gazdasági végzettséged;
legalább 3 év scrum csapatban, Product Owner szerepkörben szerzett gyakorlatod;
tapasztalatod szoftverfejlesztési folyamatok működésében,
tapasztalatod változásmenedzsmentben;
kiváló kommunikációs készséged az információk professzionális formában történő átadásá-hoz;
csapatjátékos beállítottságod és alkalmazkodó készséged;
szisztematikus munkavégzésed, rendszerszemléleted és analitikus képességed;
szakmai angol nyelvismereted.
Amit kínálunk / OfferTE VAGY AZ IDEÁLIS JELÖLT SZÁMUNKRA, HA:
fontos számodra, hogy képviselheted a felhasználót, ismered a fejlesztések üzleti követel-ményeit, a megrendelők igényeit;
képes vagy termékben gondolkodni és aktívan tudod támogatni a product manager kollégákat a termékvízió megalkotásában, inputokkal, észrevételekkel, ötletekkel,
a hosszabb távú víziót önállóan tudod kisebb, a csapatod scope-jába illeszkedő, a felhasználó számára is értelmezhető értéket képviselő szállítandókra bontani,
erősséged, hogy átlátod az üzleti célokat, meg tudod állapítani a termékkel szemben megfo-galmazott elvárások fontossági sorrendjét, így folyamatosan képes vagy priorizálni a backlog elemeit,
product owner-ként képes vagy motiválni és segíteni a csapatodat abban, hogy iterációról iterációra a maximális értéket állítsák elő,
a megértett felhasználói igényeket kiválóan le tudod fordítani a fejlesztők nyelvére, így bizto-sítod, hogy a csapat megértse a követelményeket,
tárgyilagosan tudsz döntéseket hozni a szállítás eredményeinek elfogadásáról,
megvannak a technológiai alapjaid ahhoz, hogy a system architect csapat által felvázolt technológiai elvárásokat megértsd, és szakmai vonatkozásában képviseld a csapatod előtt,
a csapat hatáskörébe tartozó technológiai, szakmai irányokat önállóan is meg tudod határoz-ni, azok leszállítását képes vagy lekövetni,
ismerősek számodra a szoftverfejlesztés eszközei, módszerei, technológiai megoldásai és korlátai;
dolgoztál már valamilyen skálázott agilis vállalati keretrendszerben (pl. SAFe),
motivál, hogy tapasztalatoddal segítheted a leendő csapatodat az érett agilis csapattá válásban, a folyamatos fejlődésben,
szívesen képviseled a termékkörödet és a csapatodat a szervezetben, a közös szervezeti agilis eseményeken,
nyitott vagy az új ötletekre és azokat másokkal közösen szereted megvalósítani, fontos számodra, hogy együtt, egymást tisztelve és segítve tudjunk kiváló minőségű termékeket fejleszteni.
Kapcsolattartó / InformationAMIT MI TUDUNK BIZTOSÍTANI, HOGY JÓL ÉREZD MAGAD NÁLUNK:
versenyképes jövedelmet és többféle egyéb juttatás; 
fél év betanulás után heti 2 nap home office lehetőség;
részese lehetsz egy magyar cég sikerének a világpiacon;
dinamikusan fejlődő és stabil háttér;
jó hangulatú, fiatalos légkör;
emberközpontú szemlélet;
meghallgatjuk az ötleteidet;
belvárosi, jól megközelíthető iroda;
magas színvonalú csapatépítő tréningeket és egyéb közösségépítő programok.
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Multilingual Service Desk Analyst állás Budapest
Tesztelés állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentDo you have good analytical skills and a result-oriented mindset? Are you ready to kickstart your career in a multilingual environment where you can use your language skills on a daily basis? Would you like to work for one of the largest providers of information technology, consulting services and business process outsourcing? If your answer is YES, perfect!  
Join one of the worlds biggest multinational companies in Budapest as a Service Desk Analyst! 
We are looking for fresh grads with strong language knowledge or candidates with 1-3 years of experience!Elvárások / RequirementsYou are the perfect candidate if you:
have confident level of English knowledge and fluent level of German/French/Italian/Dutch/Polish
feel enthusiastic about answering questions and providing support to international partner
Advantages:
Customer Service / Service Desk / IT support experience
Knowledge of computer hardware/peripherals and printers
Any previous experience or studies related to Windows operating system, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Outlook and other standard software
 Amit kínálunk / OfferAs a Service Desk Analyst (Level 1) you will resolve IT issues for our multinational customers together with your colleagues in an international team.
They will contact you via email, phone, chat or a self-service portal and your task will be to support them  by resolving the issue on the spot or by coordinating with other technician teams (Level 2) to find the resolution.
Besides IT troubleshooting, your responsibilities will include administration and translation of these incoming requests, providing information to both customers and IT teams and follow-up on unresolved cases to make sure that the teams targets are met.
 Kapcsolattartó / InformationWe offer a colourful and dynamic work environment with:
a great diversity of nationalities, cultures and business areas: almost 50% of our team is international; your colleagues are from 80 countries.
Language courses: You will have the opportunity to learn new languages or improve existing language skills. Enrol for our free language courses provided by accredited language school and practice your freshly gained knowledge on a daily basis with your team.
Training: Are you concerned about your IT skills? Are you a comfortable home user of todays technologies and have interest and affinity to learn more about IT? We are ready to provide the technical and soft skill training necessary to be successful in your position. In addition, you will have access to various well-known online learning platforms.
Internal rotations in-between professional areas and promotions: As the company is growing continuously, you will have an opportunity to choose your own career path. Our team will support your aspiration in your future personal and professional development.
Volunteering, sport and employee events: You will be part of a great community where you can engage in various sports, social responsibility activities, student or employee events while making nice memories with your teammates.
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Intermediate Programmer Analyst állás Országos
Jquery
net
SQL
Egyéb IT pozik állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, the UK, and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, and an Asset Management organization with locations in the UK, US, NL, and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit, and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, they foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. They are a people business, and they recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. They value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should ideally fulfill for this role:
At least a Bachelor's degree in IT (or equivalent experience)
3+ years of experience in web application development usingASP.Net MVC / ASP.Net Core MVC
Some experience in front end web technologies (JQuery, Vanilla JS, AJAX)
Strong experience in TSQL query language, query optimization anddatabase designing
It's a PLUS if you have:
Experience in SQL Server Reporting Services and SQL Server Integration Services
Familiarity with cloud technologies
Soft skills we look for:
Self-starter with the ability to drive results independently and through cross-functional virtual teams
Proven ability to support multiple projects and priorities simultaneously in a deadline driven environment
Amit kínálunk / OfferThe new programmer analyst's focus will be support and development for an internal financial support tool and application access management tool. Other responisbilities include:
Being a subject matter expert for specific areas, applications, or technologies
Requirements gathering with end users
Unit testing and coordination of end user testing
Query optimization
Managing software upgrades
Problem investigation and timely resolution
Note that individual may also be in an on-call rotation for 24x7 support.Kapcsolattartó / InformationCompensation:
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
 Brand new office at an excellent location
 Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
 A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Test Automation Engineer állás Budapest
Javascript
Docker
GIT
Java
GCP
Linux
NoSQL
SQL
remote
Egyéb IT pozik állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur international client is looking for an experienced test automation engineer for their team based in Budapest. By joining the team, you'll be involved in the development and testing of one of their products, which optimizes the daily utilization of flights, increases user productivity and improves airline management when there are deviations from the regular schedule.Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
3+ years of experience in test automation (or software development with a focus on QA)
Excellent English knowledge (spoken and written)
Knowledge of Java and JavaScript/TypeScript
Experience with browser-based automation tools
Experience in API testing
Familiarity with agile practises and CI/CD
Familiarity with version control (preferably Git) and issue tracking systems (preferably Jira)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes
Experience in SQL/NoSQL databases, cloud (preferably Azure or GCP), Linux/Unix
University degree in Computer Science
Amit kínálunk / OfferOur new test engineer's focus will be:
Creating automated tests on all levels of the testing pyramid
Working together with a cross-functional team to implement test development
Understanding and validating requirements from a testing perspective
Contributing creative ideas to help evolve our testing methodologies
Occasionally mentoring colleagues with less experience
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers:
Flexible working hours, remote work opportunity
Training opportunities for professional and soft skills
Supportive, professional and multinational team
Discount on company flights
Agile (scrum) environment
Working part-time is also possible

SAP Ariba Expert állás Budapest
SAP
ERP
SAP állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur fast-growing client is searching for SAP consultants with deep experties to their newly set-up IT team.Elvárások / RequirementsRequirements:
Deep SAP knowledge (S/4 preferred) in SAP purchasing processes and in SAP Ariba including the interfaces between both
Be an expert in SAP ARIBA
Have experience in end-to-end counseling related to SAP ARIBA
3 or more years of experience
Good English skills (spoken and written)
Experienced working in an international, virtual team
Amit kínálunk / OfferTasks in new position:
Over user support and ticket handling, you will be responsible for implementing, customizing, writing the requirements of the system, and be an expert in testing
Have to fulfill the requirements, coming from the business
Must be able to communicate with solution architects
Need to know the SAP purchasing module, and work with the interfaces
Supporting the roll out of ARIBA
Responsibilities:
Detailing the solution design in close cooperation with our solution architects
Customizing in SAP ERP and Ariba to fulfill business requirements
Creation of programming requests for our internal development team or for external programmers
Steering of external consultants and / or developers
Testing
Support of processes in the area of purchasing
User support, incident handling and standard service fulfillment
Participation in the S/4 rollout
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Professional development opportunities
Competitive salary
Dynamic atmosphere
Home-office possibility
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Kapcsolat
Szoftvertesztelő mérnök - Beágyazott rendszerek... állás Budapest
C
Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentKi a Partnerünk, aki hirdet?
Mint független informatikai tanácsadó és szolgáltató cég, támogatják nemzetközi ügyfeleiket, rugalmas és innovatív, személyre szabott informatikai megoldásokkal. Fő hangsúly a pénzügyi és energiaszolgáltatókra, az ipari cégekre, a média és telekommunikációs vállalatokra tevődik. Jelenleg hét európai országban vannak jelen, szakmai érdemeik és folyamatos növekedésük több mint 500 munkatársuk kiváló teljesítményének köszönhető.
Nyitott, dinamikus csapatukba keresünk most új kollégát az alábbi pozíció betöltésére:
SZOFTVERTESZTELŐ MÉRNÖK - BEÁGYAZOTT RENDSZEREKElvárások / RequirementsMilyen elvárásoknak kell megfelelned?
Szakirányú felsőfokú végzettség: villamosmérnök, mechatronikai mérnök vagy fizikus
Legalább 3 év beágyazott területen szerzett szoftvertesztelési tapasztalat
Mérnöki szemlélet, képesség összetett rendszerek gyors megértésére
Magabiztos középfokú angol nyelvtudás írásban és szóban
Proaktivitás, jó problémamegoldó képesség
Előny amennyiben rendelkezel az alábbiakkal:
Programozási ismeretekkel (C/C++) beágyazott környezetben
Haladóbb szintű ISTQB tanúsítvánnyal
Ismerősek számodra ezek a grafikus szoftverfejlesztő eszközök (CASE eszközök): Ascet, CodeSys, LabView, Simulink
Német nyelvtudással
Amit kínálunk / OfferMilyen feladatok várnak rád?
Rendszereik szoftverének tesztelése
Rendszer- és szoftverkövetelmények elemzése
Automatizált tesztesetek fejlesztése SIL és HIL környezetben
Tesztelési folyamatok és módszerek fejlesztése
Tesztelő kollégák koordinálása
Kapcsolattartás rendszermérnöki és fejlesztői csoportokkal
A validáció, illetve a beüzemelés műszaki támogatása
Code review-k, illetve szoftver auditok támogatása
Tesztfolyamatokhoz kapcsolódó tesztdokumentációk elkészítése
Kapcsolattartás müncheni kollégákkal
Kapcsolattartó / InformationMiért válaszd Partnerünket?
Modern irodai környezetben dolgozhatsz, rekreációs szobával, sportolási lehetőségekkel
Kiemelkedő bérezéssel és széles körű juttatási csomaggal számolhatsz (Cafeteria, 13. havi fizetés, egészségbiztosítási csomag, élet- és balesetbiztosítás)
Náluk kötetlen munkaidő vár heti 3 nap Home Office lehetőséggel
Lehetőséged nyílik nemzetközi projektekben való részvételre, akár külföldi helyszíneken
Ha szeretnéd fejleszteni szakmai tudásod, ők támogatnak ebben: konferenciákon, képzéseken, oktatásokon vehetsz részt általuk és tanúsítványok megszerzésében is támogatnak
Innovatív termékekkel, technológiákkal és megoldásokkal dolgoznak
Támogató és jó hangulatú csapatban történik a munkavégzés
További szakmai fejlődési lehetőséget is biztosítanak, akár több irányban is a csoporton belül: Szenior Tesztelő, Szenior Fejlesztő, Rendszermérnök
Ha biciklivel vagy autóval járnál, náluk mindkettőt biztonságban tudhatod az ingyenes és zárt parkolóikban 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Kapcsolat
Junior C# Fejlesztő állás Budapest
C#
net
SQL
Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentPartnerünk olyan szakértői tevékenységet végez, ahol automatizálására, agilis fejlesztésre, mesterséges intelligencia (MI) alapú alkalmazásra lehet szükség. Partnerként segítenek üzleti, informatikai megoldásaikkal, intelligens információs rendszereikkel és több mint negyedévszázados tapasztalatukkal.
Olyan csillogó szemű, friss tudással rendelkező junior kollégákat keresnek, akik szeretnék elsajátítani a szakma fortélyait és hosszútávú karriert építeni.
Izgalmasan hangzik? Olvass tovább!Elvárások / RequirementsTe vagy a megfelelő jelölt ha, rendelkezel az alábbiakkal:
Min. 1-2 év C# fejlesztői tapasztalat
Befejezett főiskolai/egyetemi tanulmányok
SQL ismeret
LINQ ismeret
.Net Core ismeret
Git ismeret
Professzionális hozzáállás, analitikus gondolkodási képesség
Előnyben részesítünk, ha van:
PL SQL ismereted
Banki, pénzügyi szoftverek fejlesztésében való jártasságod
Web programozásban szerzett tapasztalatod
Amit kínálunk / OfferMilyen feladatok várnak Rád?
Meglévő és új online banki core rendszerek fejlesztése piacvezető bankban
Backend (webservice) és web / kövér kliens fejlesztési feladatok ellátása
Adatbázis tervezési és fejlesztési feladatok
Kapcsolattartó / InformationMit kapsz munkád megbecsüléseként?
Stabil hátterű cégnél alapozhatod meg a karriered
Szakmai fejlődési lehetőséget
Hosszú távú karrierlehetőséget
Kihívásokkal teli, nívós projekteket
Barátságos és összetartó közösséget
Egy szakmailag erős senior csapat fogja támogatni a beilleszkedésed és a betanulási folyamatodat. Minden eszközt biztosítanak ahhoz, hogy a lehető leggyorsabban értékes tagja legyél csapatuknak! 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Kapcsolat
Fullstack fejlesztő (Angular & .NET) állás Budapest
Angular
Typescript
net
Full-stack fejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentKi a Megbízónk?
Magyarország piacvezető humánügyviteli szolgáltatója, több ezer ügyfél használja az ő megoldásaikat. Sikerük jelentős része a Kutatás és Fejlesztés területhez köthető, náluk születik a jövő, az újdonságokat ők hozzák létre! Jelenleg termékeik nemzetközi piacra való felkészítésén dolgoznak. A hazai piacon bevált megoldásaik megfelelő alapot képeznek egy nemzetközileg is sikeres szerepléshez. 
Hozzájuk keresünk most proaktív kollégát az alábbi pozíció betöltésére:
FULLSTACK FEJLESZTŐ
Most te is csatlakozhatsz hozzájuk, részese lehetsz sikereiknek! Megoldásaik az innovatív tudást és a korszerű technológiát ötvözik. Az elmúlt évben teljesen új technológiai alapokra helyezték a front- és back end oldalt, annak érdekében, hogy tudásukat, kreativitásukat a folyamatosan változó, kihívásokkal teli üzleti igények megoldására fordíthassák.Elvárások / RequirementsSikeres leszel náluk, ha:
Legalább 3 év szakmai tapasztalatod van releváns területen
Dolgoztál már Angular keretrendszerben
Rendelkezel .NET-es tapasztalattal
Ismered a TypeScript-et
Használtál már valamilyen ORM-et, illetve IoC Containert
Vannak saját ötleteid, és azokat ki is mered fejezni, illetve megvédeni
Az alábbi technológiák közül előnyt jelent, ha ismersz néhányat, de nem elvárás:
ASP.net MVC
WebApi
OData
Autofac
NHibernate
SignalR
FluentValidation
EPPlus
Amit kínálunk / OfferMi lenne a Te feladatod? 
Üzleti és fejlesztői oktatással indítunk, amely megalapozza nálunk a karriered
Ezt követően 2-4 fős csapatokban fogsz dolgozni, a kliens oldalon
A termékeink technológiai frissítésébe fogsz bekapcsolódni
Díjazzuk, ha az általad megírt kód helyes működésének ellenőrzését automata tesztekkel is támogatod
Kapcsolattartó / InformationMit kínál Partnerünk?
Élményt, szakmai fejlődési lehetőséget, kiszámítható jövőt, piacképes juttatást.
Kreatív tevékenységre alkalmas munkakörülményeket („A” kategóriás irodaház, nagy személyes tér, zöld erkélyek)!
Irodaházuk könnyen megközelíthető tömegközlekedéssel és autóval.
Miért jó náluk dolgozni?
Rugalmas munkaidő
Kihívásokkal teli feladatok
Jókedvű, kommunikálni szerető csapat
Pihenőszoba, csocsó
Évente megrendezett családi nap
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Kapcsolat
DevOps Lead (Debrecen/Budapest) állás Országos
GIT
Python
Java
Ruby
AWS
Rendszer / Hálózat, DevOps állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur international client is looking for a motivated and dynamic DevOps Lead to join their team.
Our partner is a strategic supplier to all restaurants, deploying in over 120 countries and over 37,500 locations worldwide. They provide software development, testing, deployment and support services for POS (point-of-sale) and related software applications that focus on the overall crew and customer experience, resulting in improved operations in the restaurants.Elvárások / Requirements
This role is a leadership role but also hands on - both are required
Must be an expert/have proven high level experience in AWS and all respective components
Must have proven experience and high expertise in terraform and using AWS as a cloud provider. IAC is a must
Strong knowledge in containers and container orchestration. Must be very strong in Kubernetes
Very strong understanding of CI/CD, ideally Jenkins as a tool of choice
Skilled in one or more programming languages such as Python, Ruby etc
Understanding of Java preferable but not mandatory
Thorough understanding of source control, git and trunk based dev
Experience in monitoring and dashboards, ideally new relic
Working knowledge of consul and Vault
Leadership/Softskills:
Able to lead, coach and mentor engineers of various levels of ability
Be comfortable presenting and teaching
Must be able to think about the bigger picture and create a roadmap/vision forimproving the area
Amit kínálunk / Offer
The DevOps lead will be responsible for leading and guiding a team of devops engineers across IST, HU and CST timezones
They must have proven leadership experience and be able to coach and grow their team whilst also being hands on and able to troubleshoot issues, unblock the team andthink about long term vision of the area/what needs to be improved
Kapcsolattartó / Information
International team made of young and dynamic people, who like to keep work-life balance in mind
Remote work opportunity with only a few days a month in the office
Trainings, conferences, language courses, and sport opportunities
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Project Manager - Project Data Structure & Process... állás Országos
IT management állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They allow vehicles to see, think and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, the company offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. Our client electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate and enhancing safe mobility.Elvárások / Requirements● Academic degree (min. M.Sc.) in Business / Industrial Engineering or (Business) Informatics● Min. 3 years of professional experience in (IT) Consultancy, Project or Process Management, or similar field● Excellent analytical skills, complex task / problem solving and management competences● Expertise in data structures, intelligent data management, digitalization, digital solutions and tools● Experiences in acting as IT product owner, IT product manager, and / or IT project manager● Reliable and structured way of working ensuring highest accuracy of working results● Ability to effectively cooperate & communicate with Top Management● Acknowledged competence to successfully drive interdisciplinary collaboration● Relevant experience in managing complex, multi-interface, cross-hierarchy, teams / networks● Team player, high motivation, personal drive, and self-organization talent● Knowledge of typical project outlines, project mgmt. requirements and project setupsAmit kínálunk / Offer● Represents domain Program Management in Divisional cross-sectional digitalization initiatives● Leads international, cross-sectional digitalization projects, and corresponding reporting to Top Management● Develops Project Management digitalization concepts in line with Divisional and Domain strategy● Drives cross-sectional association of data with projects, incl. data structure, keys, sources, and transfer● Defines data management processes to establish and sustainably anchorproject-oriented data structures● Oversees global roll-out for digital concepts including training, support, tracking adherence, compliance● Ensures global governance for Program Management related digitalization activities, tools, and processes● Acts as product manager for Project Management data management solutions, i.a. domain data expert, product owner in IT projects, and administrator of Project Management systems, infrastructure, and tools● Leads continuous improvement process and drives further development / digitalization roadmapKapcsolattartó / Information● Stable company background and long-term working possibility● Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company● Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries● Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses● Competitive salary and performance-related bonus● Cafeteria with optional elements● School start support 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Sharepoint Specialist állás Országos
Javascript
GIT
remote
Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is one of the leading global automotive suppliers. As an internationally positioned IT team, they support the Client's product development by providing applications and solutions for mechanical and software development and for the management of development data. In this processes, they count more than 6,000 users among their internal customers.They operate in a very heterogeneous environment of applications, such as CATIA Mechanical Design, MS Project Server, JIRA, GIT Software Management, Doors NG Requirements Management, and their PLM system CIM Database.To strengthen their team they are looking for a qualified and motivated IT specialist at our location in Budapest.We offer an exciting work environment in a globally operating enterprise with many various opportunities for your own personal and professional growth.Elvárások / Requirements
Deep knowledge of MS-Sharepoint, at least 3 years of experience
Experience in creating Nintext workflows
General IT infrastructure knowledge
Interface and REST-API knowledge
Scripting Language Knowledge such as PowerShell, JavaScript, Visual Basic
Experience in dealing with web technologies
Good English skills (spoken and written)
Experienced working in an international, virtual team
Fluency in English
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Detailing the solution design in close cooperation with our solution architects
Sharepoint development of add-on and Nintex-workflows according to the requirements of our business partners
Business Support in creating Sharepoint project rooms or communities according to the company's best practices
Evaluation and integration of new tools into the SharePoint collaboration tool environment 
User support, incident handling, and standard service fulfillment for the tool landscape 
Testing and documentation
Service owner for one or more collaboration applications possible
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Flexible working conditions with unlimited remote work possibility, you can have a real work-life balance.
Modern, newly built sustainable office in the heart of Budapest.
Competitive salary, benefits and compensation packages (Medicover, bonuses, an extra day off on your birthday).
Supportive, diverse and highly skilled community.
Ability to really make a difference and build new processes from scratch
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Kapcsolat
Service Operations /Change Management Analyst állás Országos
Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, UK and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil and Iberia and an Asset Management organization with locations in UK, US, NL and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, we foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. We are a people business, and we recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. We value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.
The Intermediate Service Management Analyst is responsible for supporting the delivery of critical services for each team that comprises Production Support. Service Management practices include Problem Management; Knowledge Management, Incident Management, Change Enablement, Capacity, Availability and Performance Management and Service Introduction.Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related degree or equivalent work experience and minimum of 2-4 years technical enterprise work experience.
Experience in change management in multinational environment
Excellent time management skills including the ability to juggle multiple priorities simultaneously.
Strong decision making and problem-solving skills.
Ability to stay committed to the task even during times of frequent change or information delays.
Comfortable working with multiple teams.
Strong verbal and written communication skills.
Accurate and precise attention to detail.
Able to build strong interpersonal relationships with teammates, leadership, senior management, and internal and external stakeholders.
Proficient computer skills, Microsoft Office Suite; working knowledge of software development.
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Understands and follows standards, policies, and procedures.
Knows fundamental process management based on ITIL and business analysis skill set. 
Design and develop user training and job aids
Develops testing plans to confirm processes are in alignment with operational requirements
Seeks to understand impact of actions on others (team, GTS, other business unit customers)
Communicates in a way that demonstrates appropriate timing, audience, content, and method
Works to identify optimal solutions or root cause of issues
Competency in gathering, analyzing, classifying, and documenting requirements
Possesses and applies comprehensive knowledge of Enterprise process and procedure issues.
Participates successfully on a project team with minimal assistance.
Works from established procedures with limited instructions
Performs varied work, requiring some originality
Makes recommendations for changes to procedures
Effectively applies fundamental concepts of function
Working knowledge of project management concepts, able to manage subsets of project tasks
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
Brand new office at an excellent location
Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
 A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Kapcsolat
Junior .NET developer állás Budapest
HTML
CSS
C#
net
SQL
OOP
Tesztelés állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
We are looking for proactive, fresh grad developers for the following position:
JUNIOR .NET DEVELOPERElvárások / RequirementsRequirements you should fulfill:
0.5-1 year of work experience in the IT sphere
Excellent knowledge of OOP and the basics of the .NET platform (.Net Framework and.Net Core)
Confident knowledge of the C# syntax
Experience with .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, CSS, HTML, JavaScript
Good knowledge of SQL and MS SQL database, ability to use EntityFramework effectively
Good technical English (conversational, written)
It is a huge PLUS if you have experience with the following:
WCF, WPF
Angular, React
Unit testing (TDD, BDD)
Amit kínálunk / OfferWhat you will do in the first three months:
Follow an individual development plan with your supervisor and improve your skills based on that
Participate in writing the application’s business logic and covering it with tests
Expand the rich user interface and offer ideas for improving it
Develop data schemas and integrate with third-party services
Optimize heavily loaded parts of the application and deal with security vulnerabilities
Become a member of a team of professionals to achieve quality results efficiently.
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat can our Partner offer?
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided for you to be able to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our client's friendly team
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Junior manual QA engineer állás Országos
Python
Java
Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
We are looking for proactive, fresh grad QA engineer for the following position:
JUNIOR MANUAL QA ENGINEERElvárások / RequirementsRequirements you should fulfill:
Experience in Web/Mobile/Desktop application testing 
Knowledge of testing methods and technologies, understanding of formal software development processes (SDLC)
Experience in building testing strategies for various projects and evaluating test coverage
Experience in working with bug-tracking systems, and version control systems
Understanding of client-server architecture
API testing experience
SQL basics
At least intermediate-level English skills
Ability to switch quickly between tasks
Flexible analytical and algorithmic thinking, desire for self-development, persistence in finding solutions, and achieving goals
It is a huge PLUS if you have experience with the following:
Higher education in IT or a related field
Basic programming or scripting skills
Automation experience in Java, Python, or another language
Experience with building servers to ensure continuous integration
Experience in performance testing
Use of traffic analyzers (Fiddler, WireShark, or others)
Amit kínálunk / OfferWhat you will do in the first three months:
Participate in the analysis of the application’s business logic and cover it with tests
Come up with an individual development plan together with your lead and improve your skills based on it
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat can our Partner offer?
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided for you to be able to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our client's friendly team

Medior/Senior Test Automation Engineer állás Budapest
Docker
GIT
Java
Linux
NoSQL
SQL
remote
Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / Department
Our international client is looking for an experienced test automation engineer for their team based in Budapest. By joining the team, you'll be involved in the development and testing of one of their products, which optimizes the daily utilization of flights, increases user productivity and improves airline management when there are deviations from the regular schedule.
Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
At least 3 years of experience in software development or test automation
Experience in Java and/or C#
Active English and Hungarian language skills (spoken and written)
Experience in CI/CD
Extensive knowledge of automation tools and software testing processes
Understanding of software development processes and methodologies (especially Agile and Scrum)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Familiarity with some of the following technologies: SQL/NoSQL databases, Git, Selenium, Azure, Linux/Unix
Bachelors Degree in Computer Science
Experience with containerized applications (Docker, Kubernetes)
Cloud experience
Amit kínálunk / OfferOur new test engineer's focus will be:
Participating in implementation projects in a cross-functional team
Implementing test scenarios from component level to system tests including non-functional ones
Proactively improving the QA strategy
Engaging in all of the steps of the development lifecycle as a tester
Validating requirement / user stories from testing perspective
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers:
Flexible working hours, remote work opportunity
Training opportunities for professional and soft skills
Supportive, professional and multinational team
Discount on company flights
Agile (scrum) environment

Software Test Engineer állás Budapest
Javascript
Java
Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentWho is our partner?
Our partner's mission is to provide a tool that makes urban commuting more convenient and contributes to building a sustainable future. Their main product is a mobile application for parking and electric vehicle charging. Furthermore they work closely with big corporations, providing software and hardware related to parking and charging. 
Right now they are looking for their new Software Test Engineer colleague.Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
Completed technical education in the field of IT or engineering
At least 3-5 years of experience in software testing
Familiarity with SQL
Reliable English knowledge
Soft skills we are looking for:
Analytical thinking
Proactivity, good communication skills
Ability to work well as part of a team
It is a PLUS if you have:
ISTQB
Some programming knowledge (preferably in Java or JavaScript)
Familiarity with some testing tools and methodologies (Postman / SoapUI /Selenium / Appium / JMeter)
Experience with an issue tracking system (Jira / Redmine / Testlink / Spira)
User level familiarity with Linux
Amit kínálunk / OfferThe following challenges await the Software Test Engineer:
Designing test scripts and test cases based on given specifications
Conducting functional and user tests
Error analysis, defect tracking and documentation
Taking part in the development and implementaton of new testing methods and principles
Working closely with the software engineer and sales teams
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers you:
Partial home office opportunity
Competitive renumeration package with stock options and education support
Diverse tasks using modern technologies
A friendly team of young professionals
A chance to join a growing project in an emerging industry

Kapcsolat
IT Architect (.NET) állás Budapest
Angular
C#
net
remote
Tesztelés állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They are looking for a new senior colleague to join their team in the following position:
IT ARCHITECTElvárások / RequirementsRequirements you should fulfill:
At least a Bachelor's degree (Master's preferred) in IT
At least 3 years of experience in a similar position (Lead software developer, IT Architect etc.)
Some experience in agile software development
Practical experience with Azure, DevOps, .NET, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Familiarity with the fundamentals of Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, and MLOps
A good understanding of low-level communication protocols.
Excellent verbal and written English language skills (German is a plus)
Soft skills we look for:
Team player attitude 
A result-oriented and systematic work approach
Excellent conceptual skills and an ability to structure complex topics
Autonomous, self-driven, flexible, reliable, and keen to push things forward
Amit kínálunk / OfferYour focus will be:
Architectural design for industry 4.0 solutions using domain-driven design and microservice architecture patterns
Design and development of a computer vision/AI solution framework - including machine learning, backend and frontend development, corresponding DevOps and automation tasks
Design of technical solution architectures based on Microsoft Azure services, Databricks, .NET / C#, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Working together with other professionals like product owners, business experts, solution architects and the development team to engineer solutions aligned with architecture guidelines.
Documentation and presenting results to the program leadership and stakeholders
Steering of the development team, orchestration of activities during the sprint and assurance of quality of results
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers:
Home office or remote work opportunity
A job full of challenges and high-level professional activities
Stable international company background
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
School start support

Kapcsolat
Software Test Engineer állás Budapest
C
C#
Python
Matlab
Tesztelés állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
University/College degree in Vehicle Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, or Computer Science
Good command of English and/or German, both written and spoken
Basic knowledge/understanding of coding, scripting, programming (Python, C, C#, C++ or other)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Experience in automotive function or system development
User-level knowledge of Matlab / Simulink, Vector tools (CANalyzer, CANape development tools)
Category C driving license
Amit kínálunk / OfferThe following challenges await our new Software Test Engineer:
Execution of tests using HIL (Hardware-In-the-Loop) simulators in the field of conventional and hybrid truck transmissions
Manual and automated evaluation of measurements (using Vector tools such as CANape, CANalyzer; FAMOS)
Development and execution of automated tests
Documentation and presentation of test results
Improvement of tests and testing strategies

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur client is an American multinational company focusing on online advertising, search engine technology, cloud computing, computer software, quantum computing, e-commerce, artificial intelligence, and consumer electronics.Elvárások / Requirements
approximately 5-7 years of experience. 
expertise in Angular (with TypeScript or JavaScript) 
eager to contribute to future success in Cloud AI. 
additional proficiency with Python, Java, C++, or Go is preferred 
Amit kínálunk / OfferDeliver end-to-end tasks towards a larger goal with minimal assistance from more senior team members.Produce completed work of consistently high quality, demonstrating most or all of the hallmarks of fleshed-out client's engineering artifacts.Plan and execute prioritized project work independently, managing their own priorities and making appropriately paced progress without supervision.Participate in design, though often with guidance.ChallengeIdentify technical problems with requirements and fix them, helping the team to course-correct when necessary.Address commonly escalated issues or triage when required.May proactively spot and suggest areas of future work for self and team.InfluenceWork within one or more teams to communicate knowledge related to broad set of tasks.Identify key stakeholders and contribute to cross-team collaboration.Coordinate timelines, goals, and objectives for assigned project component(s), understanding how work fits in with related projects or components, including dependencies and upstream/downstream implications.ExpertiseDemonstrate the development of at least one major skill outside of core coding (e.g., reliability monitoring and alerting, security and privacy practices and techniques, ensuring implementation choices support product inclusion and lead to equitable and inclusive user outcomes, documentation, integration testing, production hygiene and support processes), and an understanding of related areas of client.Responsibilities under the direction of manager:Code writing, testing & reviewWrite product or system development code for tasks with minimal assistance, conduct testing on code, design code to allow for easy testing (e.g., dependency injection), write test case descriptions to ensure coverage of critical components, review code developed by other engineers and provide feedback to ensure best practices (e.g., style guidelines, checking code in, accuracy, testability, and efficiency).Engineering excellence, documentation & debuggingSet up or improve test/monitoring/survey infrastructure or processes to ensure code health and consider system maintainability and scalability over time, contribute to existing documentation or educational content and adapt content based on product/program updates and user feedback, triage product or system issues and debug/track/resolve by analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on hardware, network, or service operations and quality.Kapcsolattartó / Information

An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities

functional safety engineer állás Budapest
Rendszer / Hálózat, DevOps állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur international partner is focused on the future of mobility on the field of autonomous vehicles, and electric drivetrains. They are looking for an experienced functional safety professional to join the fastly growing team of their's. Elvárások / RequirementsThe ideal candidate has:
A passionate interest in electric transport/mobility and an interest in developing new generations of electric mobility solutions
Implementation of the requirements adhering to functional safety standard ISO 26262
Leading and coordination of creation of functional safety work products according to ISO 26262
Experience using safety analysis (HARA, FTA, HAZOP, FMEA) and tools (PLM)
Experience in development of Functional Safety Concepts, Technical Safety Requirements and Technical Safety Concepts with relevant domain engineering teams
Established safety validation plans with relevant test engineers
Strong understanding of product development for automotive and ISO 26262, ASIL decomposition, safety mechanism
Minimum of 5 years of experience in delivering functional safety projects
Excellent understanding of the EV vehicle and its main core components
A strong analytical ability and being able to articulate the findings to key stakeholders
Great interpersonal and communication skills with an ability to articulate technical content
Advantages:
Industry experience with IEC61508
Experience working closely with electrical and software engineering teams on safety critical systems with human interaction
Ability to mentor, coach and arbitrate with your engineering peers
Industry experience in robotics, automotive or similar
Experienced in product development within an ASPICE framework
Amit kínálunk / Offer
As the Functional Safety Engineer you will lead all activities relating to Functional Safety
Working closely with cross domain engineering teams, key program and customer stakeholders and certification/regulatory agencies
You will be involved from perspective in the Conceptual, Architectural, Design and Test phases of product development. The functional safety work products will be critical for certification for application deployment
It will be important that you are able to articulate and coach Functional Safety requirements and best practices throughout the organisation
To be the key portal for information internally and externally
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner can offer:
Work at an exciting technology company within Hungary delivering globally 
Enjoy a clear sense of ownership in your field, with the satisfaction of working on developments that create the future of a new category of autonomous vehicles
Work alongside a friendly and passionate team on cutting edge technology
Have the opportunity to travel to other company offices including Australia and the UK
Enjoy modern office space and great work environment

Technical Business Analyst állás Országos
Rendszer / Hálózat, DevOps állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, the UK, and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, and an Asset Management organization with locations in the UK, US, NL, and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit, and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, they foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. They are a people business, and they recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. They value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent knowledge and a minimum related workexperience of 5 years.
Experience with functional application support preferably in the Financial Services, Banking, andInsurance industry.
Excellent English communication skills with the ability to work across multi-functional internationalteams.
Confident and effective dealing with stakeholders and end users.
Basic understanding of MS Windows Server
Basic understanding of SQL
Basic understanding of MS Internet Information Service (IIS) is preferred.
Experience with cloud concepts
Experience with networking
Experience with (S)FTP Protocol and Processes
Experience with Web Security Certificates
Experience with Service Now, Confluence, Jira preferred
Experience working on projects including requirements gathering, analysis, and documentation.
Good planning, prioritizing and goal setting skills.
High level of knowledge of standard SDLC methodologies.
Advanced ability to accept and embrace change and manage through ambiguous situations.
Understanding of Agile principles and concepts.
Soft Skills
Problem solving skills
Pro-active team player
Creative and the ability to think outside the box
The ability to work independently and also as part of a team
Strong analytical and communication skills
Attention to details
Taking responsibility
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Interact with the business in order to know and understand their processes and (IT) needs. Be theliaison between the business units, technology teams and support teams.
Work directly with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide solutions for applications andintegrations with vendor solutions.
Provide functional support for financial related applications.
Execute or assist in resolution of issues. Ensure appropriate tickets are created to record andassign issues and document resolution.
Prepare application administration documents, end-user documentation, and/or applicationtraining to end-users.
Utilize change management process to ensure modifications or upgrades are authorized, testedwhen applicable, approved, and implemented appropriately.
Act as point of contact with application vendor and customer to coordinate new releases, updates,or changes.
Ensure proper application monitoring is in place and reviewed. Coordinate with technical staff ifthere is an issue.
Understanding security, risk, and compliance controls and work with compliance team andbusiness owner to ensure controls are met and/or mitigated. Participate in IT audits.
Work within an agile environment.
Participate in initiatives and projects as assigned.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
 Brand new office at an excellent location
 Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment

IT Product Owner állás Budapest
IT management állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, the UK, and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, and an Asset Management organization with locations in the UK, US, NL, and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit, and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, they foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. They are a people business, and they recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. They value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent knowledge and a minimum related work experience of 5 years.
Experience with Product Ownership preferably in the IT area,
Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) preferred or willingness to become certified.
Excellent English communication skills with the ability to work across multi-functional internationalteams.
Strong knowledge of IT control frameworks (ITIL, COBIT) and IT Service Mgt.
Strong knowledge and experience in software development in an Agile environment.
Experience with Service Now or a similar change and incident management toolset.
Experience with Jira or a similar agile product management toolset.
Able to build strong collaborative relationships with teammates, leadership, seniormanagement, and stakeholders.
Confident and effective dealing with stakeholders and end users.
Good planning, prioritizing and goal setting skills.
Advanced ability to accept and embrace change and manage through ambiguous situations. Proven ability to balance concurrent activities.
Soft Skills
Customer focused
Leadership skills
Problem solving and decision-making skills
Integrity, Honest, and Transparent
Strong communication, negotiation, and critical thinking skills
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Ownership of the Platform Management horizontal value delivery stream.
Collaborate with CC Product Owners for the delivery of IT Platform, Non-Functional IT and Automation requirements across all CC business value streams.
Take lead of defining product vision and roadmap for scrum team and communicate with stakeholders throughout the process.
Work with internal and external contacts to analyze needs and align product roadmap to strategic goals.
Work closely with product management/business teams to create and maintain a product backlog according to business value and priorities.
Responsible for delivering budget and cost management across the IT Platforms
Ensure that the product backlog is visible, transparent, and clear to all, and shows what the Scrum team will work on next.
Engage in scaled agile practices and coordinate with other Product owners (as needed) to promote cross-team alignment around product roadmaps and dependencies.
Plan and prioritize product feature backlog and development for the product including change and incident management.
Develop detailed product specifications and ensure they’re clearly understood by the teams.
Actively mitigate roadblocks impacting successful team completion of release/sprint goals.
Lead product release planning with technical and business stakeholders and set expectation for delivery of new functionalities.
Serve as the product ambassador internally and externally, sharing knowledge and answering questions related to the product.
Manages the relationship with a group of stakeholders on a tactical level and handle conflicting interests well.
Empowered to make decisions and deliver on them.
Keep up with agile/scrum best practices and trends.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
 Brand new office at an excellent location
 Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
 A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment

Senior Business Application Support Analyst állás Országos
Mobil fejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, the UK, and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil, and Iberia, and an Asset Management organization with locations in the UK, US, NL, and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit, and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, they foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. They are a people business, and they recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. They value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.Elvárások / Requirements
Moderate to well-developed in business requirements gathering and documenting
Moderate to well-developed skill in quality assurance and testing methodologies
Moderate to well-developed skill in creating application administrator guides and userdocumentation
Moderate to well-developed understanding of application security and related complianceprocesses
Moderate to well-developed business process analysis/mapping skills
Moderate to well-developed level of experience working with Service Level Objectives (SLO) management and reporting
Moderate level of ability estimating and budgeting for IT services
Well-developed knowledge of standard SDLC methodologies
Well-developed ability to work and adapt effectively to all levels within and outside the organization; social interaction demands understanding and respect in political/corporate setting
Well-developed level communication skills (written, verbal, listening)
Moderate to well-developed skills in root cause analysis
Moderate awareness of cultural differences working within a global company
Well-developed ability to accept and embrace change, and manage through ambiguous situations
Well-developed ability to work effectively in team environment or independently
Demonstrates high work ethics, such as being proactive, accountable and responsible
High experience with MS Office products (Word, Excel, Visio, &amp; PowerPoint) as well as SharePoint
Preferred Qualifications:
Financial Services and Insurance industry experience
Experience with Data and Monitoring
Experience with Agile development, Scrum, and DevOps.
Experience with cloud technologies.
Experience of various SDLC methodologies
Ability to explain technical requirements to and work with developers and provide pseudocode.
Amit kínálunk / OfferPrimary Purpose of the Position:
The Business Analyst Pool is within GTS Service Delivery which has knowledge of businessfunctions and GTS services. The Business Analyst team partners with internal clients, externalapplication vendors and GTS team members across the world to provide business requirementsdefinition, software quality assurance, development and on-going maintenance of globalapplications that are used to support the business needs of Aegon.
Business Analysiso Define and document business requirements related to system functionality, performance, security, and internal controls; document current state and future state processes for purposes of gap analysis, process improvement opportunities and training; obtain approvals from the business sponsor.o Communicate effectively with external and internal teams to ensure the delivery of the solutions and/or project’s functional requirements.o Participate or coordinate technology evaluations by assisting business areas with changes or selection of systems. Participate or coordinate Request for Proposal processes, impact analysis and feasibility studies. Maintain relationships with IT application vendors during selection processes and implementation projects. Provideconsultancy and research possibilities with respect to solutions and cost (support business case preparation).o Interact with the business to know and understand their processes and (IT) needs. Be the liaison between the business units, technology teams and support teams.o Liaise with peers in country-units and external parties in the field of Business Analysis, Project Management, Business Process Management, Application Management and Test Management, to exchange best practices, knowledge, and processes and to mature and improve Business Analyst role and expertise/skills.
Quality Assuranceo Prepare test cases based on knowledge of how the system is designed, requirements and expected results. Execution of detailed test cases/scripts for functional testing and regression testing. Track any issues and follow up on the related resolution.o Coordinate user acceptance testing with business end-users of application.o Ensure the quality of documents and other deliverables meets quality standards, appropriate methodology and acceptance criteria.
Operational Supporto Preparation of application administration documents, end-user documentation, and/or application training to end-users.o Assist in troubleshooting/resolution of issues. Ensure appropriate tickets are created to record and assign issues and document resolution.o Utilize change management process to ensure modifications or upgrades are authorized, tested when applicable, approved, and implemented appropriately.o Act as point of contact with application vendor and customer to coordinate new releases, updates, or changes.o Ensure proper application monitoring is in place and reviewed. Coordinate with technical staff if there is an issue.o Understanding risk and compliance controls and working with GTS Compliance team to ensure controls are met and/or mitigated.
 Conforms with and abides by all regulations, policies, work procedures, instruction, and all health and safety rules.
Exhibits regular, reliable, punctual, and predictable attendance.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
 Brand new office at an excellent location
 Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
 A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment
